name: Guardian of D' Galaxy
description:
Diwata 2 (Filipino Satelite) protects and clean the surface of the Philippines.

Diwata 2 and its Guardian Explodes and Destroys Trash Floating above our Surface.

This game is created for my fellow Filipino who want some fun this pandemic..

The Inspiration of this game is Alieneo TV and Boy Tapang, who fearlessly destroy Shits.....

Boy tapang loses his channel but this game will surely remember him.
